Member of the working group on endocrine disruptors. As member of this WG, I participated to the ANSES opinion on bisphenol A published in march 2013 and to the comments sent by ANSES to EFSA during the public consultation on the EFSA draft opinion on BPA. My activity on BPA within this WG closed in march 2014.
